blog-discord-webpage-meta-description: Professional web platform to support an MMO Discord server with guides, tools, and up-to-date news.
blog-discord-webpage-intro: Development of a professional web platform to support a large Discord community for a MMO (Massively Multiplayer Online Game). The website bundles useful guides, tools, and current news, serving both new and experienced members as a central hub.
highlight-1: Multilingual platform with integrated search for quick access to content
highlight-2: Seamless Discord integration for efficient community management
highlight-3: Reactive frontend with Vue.js, SCSS, and JavaScript for modern user interfaces
highlight-4: Backend in Python with SQLite for lightweight, high-performance data management
highlight-5: Deployment via Docker containers and Nginx for flexible, stable delivery
section-goals-text: The goal of the project is to create a central platform where community members can find all relevant information, tools, and tutorials without searching through the Discord server. Even users without experience in MMOs can easily use the site. Technical terms such as 'Discord server' are explained as needed, allowing everyone to get started immediately.
section-tech-text: The frontend is based on Vue.js for a reactive and modern user interface, complemented by SCSS for consistent and maintainable styling. The backend logic runs in Python, while SQLite serves as a lightweight database to store articles, news, and user information. Hosting uses Docker (containerization) and Nginx (web server) to provide a scalable, stable, and maintainable infrastructure.
section-features-text: Core features include a powerful search function, structured guides and tutorials for players, up-to-date community news, and a central overview of essential tools. This allows even users without MMO experience to get started immediately and navigate the platform quickly.
section-outro-text: The project is still under development. Future versions will further improve user guidance, integrate new features, and make the overall user experience even more convenient. The goal is a professional platform that provides real value for both experienced community members and newcomers.
